summary:
Greetings! I'm Saad, a seasoned Regulatory Affairs professional with a strong foundation from Punjab University, Pakistan. I commenced my career in Regulatory Affairs as an Officer at NEXT Pharma, where I contributed to domestic (Local) projects.

Now, I am serving an impactful role as a Senior Officer in Regulatory Affairs at renowned organization Pharmasol Pvt Ltd, where I am contributing to both domestic and international/export projects.

My expertise spans Pharmaceuticals, Nutraceuticals, Biologicals, Medical Devices, and Consumer Health Products. I've excelled in areas such as PSQCA registrations, PCSIR testing protocols, contract manufacturing, pricing, post variations (PRVC), DTL/PQCB cases, Artworks. DIL/ADC/NOC (DRAP import-export clearances) and quota allocation in Pakistan as well as Involve in DML, GMP and DSL cases inspection and documentation.

My responsibilities include developing regulatory strategies, maintaining documentation, liaising with regulatory authorities, ensuring global compliance, and implementing robust pharmacovigilance systems. I've played a pivotal role in obtaining registrations across ASEAN member countries, CIS, and others. I bring a wealth of knowledge in eCTD/ACTD dossier compilation, and comprehensive regulatory oversight.

Connect with me for insights into regulatory affairs, compliance, and strategic approaches to navigating the dynamic pharmaceutical landscape.

currentPositions.description:
	Deals in obtaining registrations across ASEAN member countries, CIS, and others.
	Knowledge about eCTD/ACTD dossier compilation, and comprehensive regulatory oversight.
	Dealing with cases related to registration-renewals, pricing, post variations (PRVC), DTL/PQCB cases, 
        Artworks. DIL/ADC/NOC (DRAP import-export clearances) and quota allocation in Pakistan.
	Involve in DML, GMP and DSL cases inspection and documentation.
currentPositions.title: Senior Officer Regulatory Affairs

projects.description: A cross-sectional study which provides a comprehensive assessment of smog's sources, awareness, perception and preventive measures among medical and non-medical students of Lahore which is significant concern in Lahore.
projects.title: Assessment of SMOG awareness, perception, and preventive measures among medical and non-medical students of Lahore

projects.description:
In this study ,the new polymeric graft (FA CS-TGA) having thiol and folic acid groups was
successfully developed and in contrast to the loading concentration we utilized, the release
profile reveals that 99.6% of it was actually released. Hence, folic acid groups can attach to
targeted folate receptors for the delivery of tamoxifen so this could be a good delivery system.
projects.title: Tamoxifen Camouflaged Folate Decorated Thiolated Chitosan Nanoparticles: An Effective Paradigm  against Breast Cancer

message.text:
A great initial step by Drug Regulatory Authority of Pakistan  in the Case Management (Query System) regarding Eapp DRAP cases.

#regulatoryaffairs #regulatory2024 #drap #pharmacist #pharmaceuticals #phaacueticalindustry  #pharmasector #minstryofhealth

The CEO of DRAP Mr Asim Rauf led an orientation session for senior DRAP officers on the case management system of the E-App module. The Drug Regulatory Authority of Pakistan (DRAP) has launched a centralized case management system to improve operational efficiency and streamline business processes for the therapeutic goods industry. This system tracks application processing, allowing applicants to monitor their regulatory submissions and provide additional details as needed, significantly enhancing transparency and efficiency.

World No Tobacco Day 🚫

Pharmasol (Pvt) Ltd. 

 #worldnotobaccoday #notobaccoday2024 #healthyfuture #healthyenvironment #humanhealth

Tobacco harms our health and our environment. On this No Tobacco Day, let’s raise awareness and take action for a smoke-free world and cleaner air. #NoTobaccoDay #CleanAir #HealthyFuture #WellnessJourney #CleanAir #SmokeFree #PublicHealth”

Advisory | Implementation of Guidelines | Post Registration Variation

Drug Regulatory Authority of Pakistan

PRICING (Non-NEML)
Dated: 2nd March 2024. The case has been DISPOSED OF in favour of the pharmaceutical industry and the stay order against deregulation of MRPs of drugs has been VACATED. Ref.WP No. 11916/2024.

A gist of the order:

“The order has recorded that the deregulation notification was passed on directions of the Islamabad High Court in WP No. 4199/2022 and that the Federal Government was compelled to issue the notifications under Court directions.

The court has observed that since the matter has been taken up by the elected government and will be adverted in terms of law and policy applicable thereto. The petition has been DISPOSED OF.”
Drug Regulatory Authority of Pakistan

Agree???

#interview #corporateculture #motivationalquotes #pharmacueticalindustry

FALSIFIED RISEK 40MG INJECTION!!
All pharmacists and chemists working at distributions and pharmacies should immediately check their stock and stop supplying any suspected products that differ from the original. Such stock should be quarantined immediately, and supplier information should be provided to the Regulatory Field Force (DRAP, provincial and state drug control administrations) to ensure the removal of these products.
Drug Regulatory Authority of Pakistan

ingestedContentSummary.description: Zoom is the leader in modern enterprise video communications, with an easy, reliable cloud platform for video and audio conferencing, chat, and webinars across mobile, desktop, and room systems. Zoom Rooms is the original software-based conference...
ingestedContentSummary.fullText: Zoom is the leader in modern enterprise video communications, with an easy, reliable cloud platform for video and audio conferencing, chat, and webinars across mobile, desktop, and room systems. Zoom Rooms is the original software-based conference room solution used around the world in board, conference, huddle, and training rooms, as well as executive offices and classrooms. Founded in 2011, Zoom helps businesses and organizations bring their teams together in a frictionless environment to get more done. Zoom is a publicly traded company headquartered in San Jose, CA.
ingestedContentSummary.title: Video Conferencing, Web Conferencing, Webinars, Screen Sharing

message.text:
Pakistan Single Window (PSW)  would like to invite you to an online Refresher Session for the Drug Regulatory Authority of Pakistan – DRAP Module. In this session, our domain and subject experts will guide you through the process of filling out License Registration for Drug Manufacturing License and Release Order Request for Donated Drugs.
 
The meeting is scheduled for Thursday, 28th March 2024, from 11:00 AM till 12:00 PM. Interested members are requested to join the session by clicking the link below:
https://lnkd.in/dpsjDaG5

Meeting ID: 830 3031 7084
Passcode: 742061
 
You are kindly requested to disseminate the meeting invite to all relevant members of your organization/association/chamber, specifically to traders/customs agents/trade bodies working with Drug Regulatory Authority of Pakistan-related goods (Drug Manufacturing License Holders and NGOs), for their active participation and better understanding.

Pakistan Single Window (PSW)
Drug Regulatory Authority of Pakistan

GUIDELINES FOR CONDUCT AND REPORTING OF GOOD CLINICAL
PRACTICE INSPECTIONS-2nd Edition
Drug Regulatory Authority of Pakistan

Effective From: 18-March-2024
#pharmacist  #pharmaceutical  #pharmaceuticalindustry  #drap #regulatoryguidelines #regulatoryaffairs

GUIDELINES ON LABELING AND PACKING OF PHARMACEUTICAL AND BIOLOGICAL DRUGS-1st Edition 
Drug Regulatory Authority of Pakistan

Effective From: 18-March-2024
#pharmacist #pharmaceutical #pharmaceuticalindustry #drap #regulatoryguidelines #regulatoryaffairs

The second name of regulatory is "Documentation-Sychronization-Proof reading-Double-Cross Check".
THIS IS REGULATORY. 😎 
Regulatory Affairs Professionals Society (RAPS)
Drug Regulatory Authority of Pakistan
#pharmacist #pharmaceutical #pharmaceuticalindustry #regulatoryaffairs #regulatorycompliance #DRAP #raps
We work in regulatory affairs. Of course we're going to double check that document...and then check it a few (dozen) more times 😊

DRAP User Manual PSW
Drug Regulatory Authority of Pakistan 
Pakistan Single Window (PSW) 

#pharmacist #regulatoryaffairs #pharmaceutical #pharmaceuticalindustry #DRAP #psw

DRAP PRODUCT RECALL ALERT❗All pharmacists and chemist working at distributions and pharmacies 
should immediately check their stocks and stop supplying this batch of product.

Drug Regulatory Authority of Pakistan 
Pakistan Single Window (PSW)

"Important Notice to INGOs, NGOs, Hospitals and Government Programs/Departments Importers of Donated Drugs in Pakistan"

The Drug Regulatory Authority of Pakistan (DRAP) and the Pakistan Single Window (PSW) have implemented an automated clearance system for the importation of donated drugs in Pakistan. This system aims to optimize and expedite the efficiency of this process and ensure a seamless and transparent pharmaceutical supply chain in Pakistan.

To benefit from this system, all registered International Non-Governmental Organizations (INGOs), Donor Partners, Local NGOs/Hospitals, and Government Projects. 
#DRAP #importexport #PSW #publichealth

PharmaState Academy is a global Learning and Development (L&D) platform for the pharmaceutical industry. Their comprehensive L&D programs include both offline and online training modules, meticulously crafted by industry experts to address the practical needs of pharma professionals. Passionate trainers share their knowledge, ensuring students receive maximum benefit from the courses.
